summary: "A Midsummer Night's Dream" is a funny play by William Shakespeare, written around 1595-1596. It's set in Athens and has multiple stories. One is about four lovers' arguments. Another is about six actors practicing for a play. Both groups end up in a forest with fairies who play tricks on them. These fairies also have their own drama. Despite all the confusion, it's one of Shakespeare's most beloved and performed plays.
title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
